function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of infectious diseases through HVAC systems","Impact":"Increased risk of infection spread and transmission","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance, filtration, and disinfection of HVAC systems","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, ultraviolet light air disinfection systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors, customers","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate natural ventilation leading to infection spread","Impact":"Increased risk of infection transmission in indoor spaces","Mitigation":"Utilization of operable windows, cross-ventilation design, and energy recovery ventilation systems","Technologies":"Operable window systems, energy recovery ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Architects, building designers, facility managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate building design for air flow patterns","Impact":"Increased risk of infection spread and transmission","Mitigation":"Designing buildings to encourage natural ventilation and air circulation","Technologies":"Cross-ventilation design, operable window systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Architects, building designers"}]}
